## Checklist
- [ ] Sensible git history (for example, squash "typo" or "fix" commits): See the
      [Rewriting History](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Rewriting-History) guide for
      help.
- [ ] Update the changelog (if necessary)
